chunks.chunk_text: In this programme we'll be asking whether wearing masks in public can help prevent the spread of coronavirus in the community.Face masks have long been popular in some Asian countries but with the spread of COVID-19 they're increasingly being seen in other parts of the world too.Wearing a protective mask or face covering is nothing new. Medical masks have a long history from the plagues of medieval Europe to 19th century outbreaks of cholera in the United States.
